## 📦 安装方法

### 通过pip安装
```bash
pip install simtradelab=={{version}}
```

### 通过Poetry安装
```bash
poetry add simtradelab@{{version}}
```

### 从源码安装
```bash
git clone https://github.com/kay-ou/SimTradeLab.git
cd SimTradeLab
git checkout {{tag_name}}
poetry install
```
